```{r warning=FALSE}
# diagnosis times
times <- estimate_start_to_diag(data)

# total costs
cost_distns <- COST.distns.allerror

rcosts <- means_distributions(cost_distns)

costs <- calcPatientCostofTests(data, COSTS = rcosts)
```
